content.value:
​​People tell you stories about quality, commitment and innovation. But for the real story, take a close look at the numbers. In an industry where an hour of downtime can cost thousands, Sandvik parts and services can save you millions, with around-the-clock service, qualified engineers and genuine parts on demand.

​​

rows.text: Extend service intervals by up to 50%*
of gained production through Sandvik planning services*

children.title: Service programs
children.subTitle: Productivity you can count on
children.description: Meet your production targets in smarter, faster and more cost efficient ways.

content.value: When you can predict your productivity you predict profitability. Sandvik service programs are about optimizing performance 365 days a year. It’s about removing risk from your operations from the minute equipment is delivered through it's operating life to make it run as efficient as possible.

value.value:
​Lower operating costs, longer service life

Our highly trained, expert engineers deliver you the right parts and service to ensure safe operation, low operating costs and long service life. Service from us isn't just quick and convenient. It gives you longer uptime and an increase in process efficiency and equipment reliability you can truly count on.

children.title: Start-up services
children.subTitle: Get your mine moving
children.description: Everything you need, from financial support to equipment relocation planning, strip and assembly. Explore our Start-up Services

content.value: ​Quicker start-up means a faster path to profit. Our complete portfolio of start-up services helps you get up and running as quickly as possible, cutting out hindrances and adding weeks of additional production time compared to going it alone.

​Our start-up services
From finance to relocation

Our start-up services provide everything you need, from financial support to equipment relocation planning, strip and assembly, commissioning and local adaptions while ensuring compliance with local legislations and specific mine requirements.

children.title: Money for your mine
children.subTitle: Tailored finance & credit services
children.description: Benefit from customized credit services with competitive rates and flexible finance terms. Explore our Financial Services

content.value: ​Financing opens up a world of possibilities for expanding your business and maximizing profitability. Our in-house financing services company Sandvik Credit offers competitive interest rates, flexible finance terms and the benefit of working with a finance provider that understands your industry.

​Flexible financial services

When you choose Sandvik Credit, you’re harnessing a wealth of knowledge and expertise behind your products and machinery. We understand your business, your challenges and what you need from finan-cial services. We offer you everything from leasing and rent-to-purchase with flexible payment plans. Our local colleagues give you the personal attention you need to structure loans or leases according to your application and maintenance needs.

config:
Finance leases
Get the equipment you need today. We will approve your credit application within 48 hours.

Rent-to-purchase programs
The flexibility to return or acquire your equipment at the end of the rental period.

Flexible payment plans
Structure your payment plans according to what suits your specific plant and time requirements.

children.title: Ramp-up services
children.subTitle: For quicker profits
children.description: Get your equipment up and running faster. Explore our Ramp-up Services

content.value: ​Our ramp-up services program helps you get production up and running in the shortest time. It can add up to five weeks of additional production compared to a “do it alone" approach.

config:
Fast-track equipment
Fast-track on orders to make sure all equipment is available exactly when you need it.

Simulator training
Train operators on simulators so they can work productively within hours of being introduced to a new rig.

content.value:
​A FASTER WAY TO START UP

Adding new generation equipment to older fleets requires training and the personnel familiarizing themselves with the new fleet. By using our ramp-up services, you minimize integration and start-up time. 

 

RAMP-UP SERVICES INCLUDE:

  • Training in product safety, processes, equipment components and functions, operation and maintenance and more
  • Stock planning to set the level of spares and wears on site
  • Maintenance planning to set the maintenance schedule for each piece of equipment, and a troubleshooting guide
  • One year process optimization

config:
Planned startup
Our skilled engineers ensure everything is installed and set up for a fault-free startup and minimal downtime.

Make the most of your machine
The way to ensure optimal equipment performance is to put commissioning in the hands of Sandvik’s expert engineers, who are expertly trained for the job.

content.value:
Fast track your equipment deployment

Achieve the fastest possible startup and reach optimal performance quickly. Our commissioning teams work with your engineers to plan and complete a safe, well-designed, best-in-class facility delivered on time and according to plan.

config:
Localized to your specifications
Our factories and world class workshops modify all Sandvik equipment to ensure it complies with local laws and your exacting requirements. Examples of the work we perform are customized light signalling, detection systems and fire suppression

Disassembly and assembly

Worry-free relocation

Our engineers take the stress out of equipment relocation. We have everything in place to transport equipment from Sandvik facilities or another mine to your site. Our services include disassembling equipment to get it underground and reassembling it, so it’s ready for commissioning.

children.description: Enjoy greater uptime, longer equipment lifetime and complete cost control. Explore our Maintenance and Repair Services

content.value: Proper maintenance and repair services help prevent downtime. Count on us to provide Sandvik trained technicians to assist with either scheduled maintenance or unscheduled damage repairs.  By selecting a Sandvik service agreement that provides you with maintenance planning and repair services you can gain up to 10 days of production by not having to wait for parts or service.

value.value:
​Maximize profit
Minimize stoppage time

Our maintenance and repair services keep your trucks, loaders, drills and crushers moving around the clock. All of our services give you greater uptime, longer equipment lifetimes and complete cost control.

children.title: Sandvik product services
children.subTitle: Boost production time by weeks
children.description: Keep your products in the best working order with our condition inspection, Maintenance planning, Protective and performance services  Explore our Product services

content.value: ​Boost your technical capacity, equipment reliability and operational productivity. Our product services get your equipment up and running faster, keep everything running smoother, and prevent costly downtime. Why leave anything to chance?

value.value:
​Huge savings

On everyday running costs

Save millions on your day-to-day running costs using our Sandvik product services, from condition inspection services that save at least one day, maintenance planning that can save 7-10 days and protective services that give you 80% coverage. Our complete range of product services will boost your bottom line.

content.text: Our 80-point checklist reveals exactly how your equipment is doing. It keeps your operation running smoothly and safely. We also make sure all necessary parts are always available at your site, minimizing downtime and keeping production running to its capacity. This proactive service flags any problems that may occur at an early stage, so you can stop any trouble before it starts.

Our Maintenance Planning Services are individually tailored to your mine to ensure greater uptime and minimize the risk of unnecessary stoppages. These fully flexible services can include everything from basic maintenance to periodic inspections, condition inspections, maintenance planning and annual plant audits. We put together a unique service solution that delivers you maximum performance and low operating costs. You can count on saving up to 10 days of production with our Maintenance Planning program.

Our Protective Services program covers everything from extended warranty, training, periodic inspections, process support, maintenance and stock planning and an annual plant audit. It saves you 7–10 days of production, helping you achieve your targets. You can extend the program to cover capital spare parts andtake out up to 80% coverage, so should something go wrong, we’ll be on hand to quickly make it right.

Our Performance Services give you the data and insights you need to obtain maximum performance from your equipment and assets. When the right people have the right information at the right time they can fix and maintain assets before they fail. The result is optimal mining productivity. It’s your way to assure opti-mal equipment performance, lower operational cost and control of risks.

content.value: ​Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Supervisory planning services
children.subTitle: Keep performance at its peak
children.description:
Training, monitoring and planning support services that keep everything operating at peak performance. 
Explore our Supervisory and Planning Services

content.value: ​Keeping equipment running at peak performance requires specialized knowledge and skill. Sandvik Supervisory services include Training Support and Planning Support contracts to ensure best practices are reached to maintain peak performance.

value.value:
​​Training Support, plugging skills gaps

Training Support contracts identify skills gaps within your workforce and coach your staff in best practice maintenance to ensure your equipment is operating at peak performance. Technical support assessment, Toolbox and equipment audits to identify gaps with technical skills, infrastructure or equipment condition to correct "the sins of the past". This helps to restore equipment condition and reduce unexpected downtime by as much as 20%. Coaching sessions and expert equipment calibration to keep everything on track.

content.value:
Planning Support—stay on top of your equipment

Tracking the vital statistics of your equipment keeps you up to date on how it's being used, how it's performing and helps predict and plan upcoming work to keep it performing at its best. Our planning personnel and state of the art systems help make sure everything runs optimally.

Ensuring parts are available when you need them can reduce downtime by an average 20%. Smart planning means fewer parts held in stock, better planned work, less machine failure.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

children.subTitle: Peace of mind to focus on production
children.description: Expertly-trained service and breakdown crews to manage all aspects of plant maintenance. Explore our Fully outsourced services

content.value: ​Fully outsourcing maintenance services leaves you free to concentrate on increasing production and profitability in your mine. It saves you the trouble of recruiting and developing an in-house maintenance department.

value.value: When you outsource all maintenance work to our expertly-trained service and repair crews you eliminate the hassle of recruiting training and managing your own technicians.  This improves equipment reliability , reduces reparetime up by 20%. all of this equates to an overall reduction in your equipment parts cost of up to 90%.

rows.text: An overall reduction in your equipment parts cost  by up to*

content.value:
Service and breakdown expertise

Our on-site service crews optimize work execution and quality, minimizing unexpected downtime thanks to more reliable equipment. This results in quick repair times and fewer breakdowns. Our experts know all about your equipment reliability and help you better manage production schedules.


Advanced maintenance planning

Tracking the vital statistics of your equipment keeps you up to date on how it's being used, how it's performing and helps predict and plan upcoming work to keep it performing at its best. Our planning personnel and state of the art systems help make sure everything runs optimally.

children.title: Consumables, Fluids & Kits
children.subTitle: Longer life and lower cost of ownership
children.description: Genuine, high-quality materials that are the perfect fit for performing in your harsh, unpredictable conditions.

content.value: ​Non-genuine parts and low quality fluids reduce the working life of machines and negatively impact production. Sandvik Original filters, as well as field-proven service and repair kits have been developedand tested to withstand the toughest conditions. The result is improved performance, higher reliability and reduced costs.

Keep your operations moving

All of our consumables, fluids and kits are designed to fit perfectly with your equipment. They eliminate leakage, improve efficiency, extend service intervals and reduce the possibility of equipment failure.

children.title: Filters
children.subTitle: Safe, lasting performance
children.description: Genuine, high-quality Sandvik air filters, coolants, hydraulic filters and filter kits give you the perfect fit.  Explore Filters

content.value: ​All filters may look the same, but there are huge differences in their ability to do their job. Only genuine, high-quality Sandvik filters can guarantee the perfect fit for lasting and safe performance, even in harsh, dusty, volatile and unpredictable conditions.

value.value:
​Protect your equipment

Sandvik high quality filters are specifically designed for heavy mining machinery. 100% compatible with sandvik machines, they increase equipment performance, reduce risk of stoppages, increase machine reliability and extend time between filter exchange.  Their effective dirt and dust holding capacity is between 70-100% higher than non-original filters.

content.value: ​Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Sandvik Hydraulic oil filters
children.subTitle: Remove damaging particles from oil flow
children.description: Even under the harshest mining conditions, Sandvik hydraulic oil filters keep your system pro-tected. Explore Sandvik hydraulic filters

content.value: ​Sandvik genuine hydraulic oil filters are designed to remove the particles from the oil flow that damage components like pumps, valves and motors. Protecting your equipment from contaminants also eliminates jerkiness and false movements in machines.

value.value: ​The right filter can make all the difference. About seventy percent of hydraulic system failures are caused by contamination. When abrasive particles are not filtered effectively, it causes premature wear, damage and poor performance in components such as pumps, valves and motors. Sandvik genuine hydraulic filters are designed to remove particles from the oil flow and preserve system integrity, even in your harshest mining conditions.

config:
Designed for mines
High-quality filter media and durable filter structure is designed specifically for the mining industry’s harsh conditions.

100% compatible
Sandvik hydraulic filter media is always 100 percent compatible with the recommended hydraulic oil used with our equipment.

Faster filtration
With a higher beta value, Sandvik hydraulic filters remove particles faster, eliminating damaging particle build-up.

content.value: * ​Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Engine air filters
children.subTitle: A perfect fit every time
children.description: Thanks to a unique design, Sandvik engine air filters are compact, but have less air restriction and a longer lifetime. Explore Sandvik engine air filters

content.value: ​Peak engine performance relies on a perfect fit. Sandvik engine air filters are compact yet powerful, and always guaranteed to deliver the right fit.

value.value: ​Air is a critical component of combustion for diesel engines. If the air filter can’t clean intake air effectively, particulate matter clogs the engine and causes excessive wear. The result is reduced engine performance, reduced fuel efficiency and, ultimately, total engine failure. Our engine air filters fit perfectly every time to prevent contamination and boost performance and longevity.

config:
Peak performance
Unique technology delivers longer filter life, cleaner air and greater costs savings than other types of filter media

Compact, powerful
Thanks to a unique media design, our air filters are compact, but have less air restriction and a longer life-time.

Efficient dust capture
A nona-fibre layer is added to the filter media for highly efficient capturing of submicron dust particles such as shoot

content.value: * Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Sandvik engine oil filters
children.subTitle: Protecting engines from abrasion and premature wear

content.value: Sandvik genuine engine oil filters remove solid contaminants – such as dirt, carbon and metal particles – from the oil before they can damage bearing, journal and cylinder wall surfaces in the engine. They protect equipment from abrasion and premature wear.

​Sandvik engine oil filters have a built-in bypass valve for extra safety, which prevents a plugged filter from starving the engine of lubrication. When differential pressure across the oil filter element exceeds a predetermined value – depending on the engine application – the bypass valve opens so oil can continue to flow to the engine, keeping vital parts lubricated.

config:
Durable and reliable
Sandvik filters use high-quality filter media and durable filter structure, specifically designed for the mining industry, ensuring the best level of fluid and air purification in all operating environments.  Latest developments in fiber media and higher dirt holding capacity allow you extend filter exchange and service intervals which reduces your TCO.

The right bypass settings
Sandvik genuine engine oil filters have bypass settings specifically designed for mining applications. They allow an easy, uninhibited oil flow for total engine protection.

Stop damage before it starts
Sandvik oil filters remove contaminants before they can damage vital engine components. This inreases machine reliability and reduces the risk of stoppages and breakdowns

content.value: ​Cleaner fuel means better performance. Sandvik fuel filters keep fuel free of particles and water to enhance performance and keep system pressure consistently high.

value.value: ​When you’re using a modern high-pressure common rail injection system, keeping fuel clean and water-free is a top priority. Any contaminants that reach the fuel line can cause misfiring, premature component wear and breakages. Just as important, filtration needs to happen without disrupting system pressure. Our fuel filters achieve the perfect balance between fuel filtration and pressure consistency.

config:
Designed for mines
Sandvik genuine fuel filters fulfill the filtering and water separation requirements for mining under harsh conditions.

High capacity
Our fuel filters can be equipped with an extra water separator to deliver an extra-high water holding capacity.

Consistent pressure
Our fuel cleaning system enables you to achieve a new level of fuel purity while maintaining consistently high pressure.

content.value: ​* Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Sandvik oil separators
children.subTitle: Complete oil separation
children.description: Almost complete separation of oil, keeps compressors running at maximum efficiency. Explore oil separators

content.value: ​Specifically designed to work with our Sandvik compressors, Sandvik genuine oil separators almost completely separate oil, keeping compressors running at maximum efficiency.

value.value: ​Sandvik’s ruggedly built oil separators are application tested to withstand vibrations and temperature variations in even the harshest mining operations. Specially designed for Sandvik compressors and built using special materials, they efficiently and completely separate oil.

config:
The perfect fit
Sandvik oil separators are specially designed to fit Sandvik compressors. In combination with low flow re-sistance, they enable almost complete separation.

Application tested
The tough structure is built to withstand vibrations and temperature variations in harsh mining operations.

Consistent separation
The oil separators are built using the right materials to optimize performance throughout the separator change interval.

content.value:
Durable and reliable

Sandvik oil separators use the principle of coalescence in which layers separate oil from the compressor and return it back. Together with low flow resistance, the process ensures minimum oil consumption while retaining high performance throughout the separator change interval.


Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.subTitle: Field-proven kits to reduce risk and downtime
children.description: Maximize total performance and extend lifetime of all components using kits that include only Sandvik genuine partsExplore service and repair kits

content.value: ​Sandvik service and repair kits are cost effective and convenient, ready-to-order kits that simplify the service process by ensuring you have everything you need, when you need it.  And be-cause the kits include only Sandvik genuine parts, you can be confident that they will perform as well as the components they replace.

​A smarter way to service and repair

Sandvik service and repair kits are designed to maximize convenience and value. Each kit includes everything you need to complete repairs or replacements on your loading and hauling equipment, drill rigs or crushing and screening installation. By bundling an average of 10 to 20 part numbers into a single kit, you'll reduce the number of time-consuming purchase orders to multiple vendors.

children.title: Loading and hauling kits
children.subTitle: Optimize performance, extend operating life
children.description: Systems designed to meet the challenges of underground hard rock mining. Explore Loading and Hauling

content.value: ​Our maintenance, endurance and repair kits offer practical, convenient solutions that include everything you need to run at peak efficiency and bring your equipment up to our OEM standards.

value.value: ​Regular exchanges and repair of consumables and parts are necessary to ensure peak performance and reliability throughout the life of your loader. Keep your loader in excellent repair, ensure maximum reliability and extend the lifespan of individual components such as axles, gearboxes or torque with our Sandvik endurance and repair kits. You’ll save on maintenance time and reduce operational costs by up to 38 per-cent by using kits with our genuine Sandvik parts.

rows.text: Reduce operational costs by up to *

content.text: Our kits consist of original quality parts designed for superior machine performance.With just one kit number and box, maintenance kits include everything you need to extend loader life and minimize downtime.

Sandvik endurance kits reduce the risk of unexpected failures and extend product life. Kits contain all parts to be replaced during component repair on Sandvik loaders such as axles, gearboxes or torque. Using Sandvik Endurance kits for recommended service intervals offers 10% higher performance compared to ad hoc repairs.
Our loader repair kits are customized for functional repairs of an axle gearbox or torque. They contain all the parts you require to perform necessary repairs discovered during inspections

content.value:
Peace of mind

Sandvik maintenance, endurance and repair kits give you advanced engineering expertise in a compact package that makes servicing remote locations easier. We deliver direct from our warehouse to your mine to make loader upkeep faster and easier than ever. We also guarantee that all parts are genuine, original and manufactured to our highest OEM standards to ensure stable performance, reliability and durability in your harsh mining conditions.

children.subTitle: Field-proven kits to reduce risk and downtime
children.description: Everything you need to perform key repairs simultaneously and minimize downtime. Explore Drill rigs

content.value: ​After carefully examining rock drill maintenance we have bundled key parts into practical kits for specific functional tasks. These kits provide everything you need to perform key repairs simultaneously and minimize downtime.

value.value: ​You’ll spend less money on maintenance and increase repair quality, extending service intervals, reducing the risk of unexpected failures and lowering total cost of ownership. Our rock drill endurance and repair kits offer you around 15% reduction in maintenance costs, and up to 30% higher performance compared to ad hoc repairs.

content.text: Endurance Kits contain all parts that should be replaced during each standard rock drill service, delivering reliability and extending service intervals.

Repair kits
Customized for all functional aspects of rock drill maintenance and faults discovered during inspection.

Rotation Kit 
A reliable kit that ensures alignment and smoothly delivers torque to the bit, efficiently breaking rock.

Percussion Kit
Minimizes cavitation and maintains frequency and power longer into the service interval.

Flushing Head Kit
Protects and seals the front of your rock drill.

Body Kit
Delivers accurate alignment and positioning of key parts, providing high efficiency and performance.

Stabilizer Kit
Delivers longer durability and productivity.

Bolt Kit
Contains all bolts used in the rock drill.

content.value:
Minimize maintenance 

Sandvik rock drill kits consist of genuine OEM parts and are manufactured to the highest standards to en-sure stable performance, reliability and durability in harsh mining environments. Our kits are customized for all aspects of rock drill maintenance and can extend intervals between service by up to 50%.

children.subTitle: Enhance availability and performance
children.description: Extend the lifetime of your equipment and parts, and save on unexpected downtime.

content.value: ​The stakes are high for mining and materials handling equipment. Keeping your equipment in excellent shape is vital for uninterrupted productivity.

​Exceeding expectations

Upgrade your fleet and outfit your equipment with the latest technology. Benefit from increased productivity, improved safety and extended working hours. Our Equipment improvements enable equipment to function at its best to achieve demanding production targets

children.title: Loading and Hauling
children.subTitle: Flexibility and a longer life
children.description: From improvements, upgrades and wear protection for key machine elements to fire suppression and proximity detection, we keep you running safely and smoothly. Explore Loading and hauling

content.value: ​Superior engineering, innovative design and precision manufacturing help ensure peak performance, longevity and significant savings.

​Better solutions for loading and hauling

From ground engaging tools (GET) and buckets to equipment upgrades to fire suppression and software services, Sandvik helps you maximize returns on your hard-rock underground loading and hauling.

children.title: Ground engaging tools (GET)
children.subTitle: Higher bucket productivity, longer life
children.description: Our proven ground engaging tools (GET) are designed to meet the challenges of hard rock mining and can be customized to suit your needs.  Explore GET

content.value: ​Our proven ground engaging tools (GET)—mechanical or weld on—are designed to meet the challenges of hard rock underground mining and can be customized to suit your bucket loading needs.

value.value: ​With two solutions for ease of change out or welded, there’s a GET system to fit your needs. Our Sandvik ground engaging tools include mechanical lip shrouds, mechanical heel shrouds, weld on product half arrows, heel shrouds standard and long cast profile bars plus cast corners for structuralstrength. Save up to 45% compared to bare lip with our GET solutions.

config:
Extended life
Increase overall bucket life by protecting the integrity and geometry of the bucket design.

Lower costs
Reduce cost per ton and cost per hour throughout the lifespan of your bucket.

Stabilize output
Achieve a more continuous, stable production output by maintaining bucket geometry.

content.value: ​Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Wear protection buckets
children.subTitle: A ‘total bucket concept’for total productivity
children.description: Get total engineering flexibility with a total-concept solution that improves overall productivity while reducing maintenance costs.  Explore wear protection buckets

content.value: ​Designed with total flexibility in mind, our optimally engineered buckets for underground loaders deliver the highest quality standards in both structural design and manufacturing.

Sandvik wear protection buckets focus on four key areas: optimal design, fabrication standards, highest quality steel and ground engaging tools (GET). This total bucket concept delivers a solution to improve overall productivity, reduce maintenance costs and deliver a tangible return on your investment.

config:
Wear performance
Premium steel choice ensures wear performance and longevity of your bucket.

Lifetime integrity
Design and quality control during manufacture ensures integrity over your bucket lifetime.

Better fill factor
Maintaining the geometry of the bucket design improves the fill factor over time.

children.title: Fire suppression systems
children.subTitle: Fast, effective fire protection
children.description: Fast protection that limits the consequences of a fire.Explore fire suppression

content.value: ​Effective and easy to use, our fire suppression systems help ensure the safety of your personnel and loading and hauling equipment.

​Our fire suppression systems feature our world-first Eclipse™foam, which suppresses fires faster and minimizes environmental impact. Eclipse™foam is specifically designed to suppress hydrocarbon fuel and oil fires. When a hydrocarbon fuel ignites, the vapors and not the fuel burns. Eclipse™foam cuts off the oxygen supply, acting as a vapor seal over the fuel, while the water content in the foam cools the area, greatly reducing the risk of re-ignition.

 

Eclipse is only applicable for markets where operational temperatures do not fall below 0 degrees Celsius.

config:
Fluorine free
Protect the environment from the damage caused by fluorine-based foams.

Vapor barrier
Prevent vapors from escaping, helping keep people and the environment safer.

Cost savings
Superior fire suppression results in better post-fire protection and lower repair costs.

children.title: Underground drill rigs
children.subTitle: Optimize performance and longevity
children.description: Safety improvements, software services, upgrades, leases and custom engineered solu-tions keep your underground drilling operations on track and on schedule. Explore Underground drill rigs

content.value: ​We offer a comprehensive line of service and product solutions to keep your underground drill rigs running at peak performance, including upgrades, leasing, custom engineered solutions and safety products.

​Productivity and safety improvements for underground drilling

Sandvik offers a complete range of services and solutions to increase your penetration rate, extend equipment lifespan, control your costs and minimize your risks in an underground drilling environment. In addition to standard parts provision, upgrades and leasing, we offer custom-engineered solutions that are tailored to your unique requirements and meet all standards and OEM certifications.


Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Rock drill upgrades and leasing
children.subTitle: Smart ways to put new technology to work
children.description:
Harness the latest R&D advancements in your operation by upgrading to the latest Sandvik rock-drill technology.
Explore rock drill upgrades and leasing

content.value: ​Upgrading or leasing our Sandvik rock drills is the smartest, most cost-effective way to harness the latest R&D advancements in your operation.

value.value: ​Optimize your existing setup and maximize your output. Choose our performance upgrade kits to enjoy seamless progression to the latest technology, or control costs and minimize risk with a leasing program that invoices you monthly for each percussion-hour drilled. Either way, you'll rest assured that your rock drill performs at optimum efficiency throughout its operating life. See up to a 55% increased penetration rate and up to a 30% reduction in operating costs with an upgrade, or enjoy peace of mind with a lease that offers an extended service warranty and 48-hour expedited turnaround time on repairs.

config:
Latest R&D
Get the latest advances in technology working for your underground drilling operations sooner and maximize your output

Exceptional service
Maximize drilling uptime with regular service intervals plus an extended warranty for servicing.

Predictable costs
Our price-per-hour solution gives you total cost control and predictable operating costs.

children.title: Subassemblies for feeds and booms
children.subTitle: Less downtime, higher productivity
children.description: Invest in higher productivity and minimize equipment downtime and labor-intensive repairs with our high-quality engineered subassemblies. Explore sub-assemblies for feeds and booms

content.value: ​Our high-quality engineered subassemblies for feeds and booms are a wise investment in higher productivity for your underground drilling operations.

value.value: ​Sandvik subassemblies for feeds and booms give you a complete front-end solution for underground drilling optimization. Minimize equipment downtime and reduce the number of on-site personnel required to carry out labor-intensive repairs on complex components. All components are fully assembled and tested to ensure quick change over and set-up time for change outs, and every subassembly is protected by a 12-month warranty.

config:
Peace of mind
All subassemblies include guaranteed quality standard parts subjected to extensive testing.

Improve personnel safety
Eliminating the need for labor-intensive repairs on complex parts keeps your personnel safer.

Advanced technology
Sandvik subassemblies are built with components that reflect the latest enhancements

children.title: Custom-engineered solutions
children.subTitle: Equipment enhancements tailored to your needs
children.description: Upgrade your equipment to the latest technology without new capital investment through our pre-engineered and custom-engineered solutions. Explore custom-engineered solutions

content.value: ​Our aim is to support your business with a complete package of solutions customized to suit your mining conditions and application, enabling your Sandvik equipment to achieve maximum productivity at all times.

value.value: ​We offer pre-engineered and custom-engineered solutions to upgrade your equipment to the latest technology without any additional capital investment. Each solution is designed by the industry's most competent engineers to increase productivity and improve safety in your operation. Reduce operational and maintenance costs, optimize your underground drilling performance and improve safety in your everyday operations. All engineered solutions are OEM-certified and conform to all standards, and every component is delivered with a Sandvik warranty.

config:
Repair and rebuild
Repair, rebuild, enhance or modify existing equipment quickly, safely and confidently.

Better safety
We continuously invest in technology and standards that enhance operational safety.

Fully warrantied
All engineered solutions are OEM-certified and backed by a Sandvik warranty.

children.title: Fire suppression systems
children.subTitle: Protect your underground drilling operations
children.description:
Protect your underground drilling operations with fast protection that limits the consequences of a fire.
Explore fire suppression

content.value: ​Effective and easy to use, our fire suppression systems help ensure the safety of your personnel and equipment underground.

​Our fire suppression systems feature our world-first Eclipse™ foam, which suppresses fires faster and minimizes environmental impact. Eclipse™ foam is specifically designed to suppress hydrocarbon fuel and oil fires. When a hydrocarbon fuel ignites, the vapors and not the fuel burns. Eclipse™ foam cuts off the oxygen supply, acting as a vapor seal over the fuel, while the water content in the foam cools the area, greatly reducing the risk of re-ignition.

 

Eclipse is only applicable for markets where operational temperatures do not fall below 0 degrees Celsius.

config:
Fluorine free
Protect the environment from the damage caused by fluorine-based foams.

Vapor barrier
Prevent vapors from escaping, helping keep people and the environment safer.

Cost savings

children.title: Crushing and screening
children.subTitle: Built to outperform
children.description: Innovative, tested and patented solutions for optimizing crushing and screening in real time and performing under pressure will boost productivity in your toughest applications. Explore Crushing and Screening

content.value: ​Sandvik crushing and screening equipment employs smart functions to ensure they automatically run at maximum performance all the time.

More from your ore

Sandvik crushers and screens employ an aggressive crushing action that processes more ore while maintaining product size, resulting in more throughput. Choose from a range of crushing chambers suited for the exact application and conditions you need. Constant feed size opening and automatic wear compensation maximizes and maintains production capacity throughout liner life.

children.title: Wear protection
children.subTitle: Longer, safer equipment life
children.description: Enjoy extended equipment life, safe handling, minimized noise levels, reduced maintenance and operating costs and easy handling with our proven designs. Explore Wear protection

content.value: ​Sandvik provides a wide and versatile range of wear protection products that extend equipment life, offer safe handling, minimize noise levels, reduce maintenance and operating costs and are easy to handle.

​Reduce your operational costs

Sandvik wear protection solutions include cast-in carbide, ceramic, rubber products and impact bars all designed to withstand the rigors of your harsh mining environment. Reducing operational costs, our solutions also improve safety and extend the times between services for optimal uptime in your mine.

children.title: Cast-in carbide
children.subTitle: Built to withstand harsh handling
children.description: Our cast-in carbide is a unique wear material that combines durability, shock resistance, ductility and strength to withstand harsh material handling applications. Explore Cast-in carbide

content.value: ​Our cast-in carbide is a unique wear material that combines durability, shock resistance, ductility and strength to withstand harsh material handling applications and ensure your productivity remains at its peak.

SANDVIK HX900 LINERS

Our high-performance cast-in carbide Sandvik HX900 liners can be used in a wide range of material handling applications to protect against heavy wear. Rugged wear protection reduces service and stoppage, saving you time and money. Our liners offer a long wear life in heavy impact and abrasive wear applications, extending the time between replacements. Cast-In carbide Sandvik HX900 liners are easy to order and available in standard or custom-made sizes.


Suitable for many applications

Superior wear resistance means immense application possibilities.

config:
Save time and money
High performing wear protection reduces service and stoppage, saving you time and money.

Long time between replacement
Long wear life in heavy impact and abrasive wear applications saves on replacement.

Standard or custom-made
Cast-in carbide Sandvik HX900 liners are available in standard or custom-made sizes, making them easy to order

children.title: Ceramic wear plates
children.subTitle: More uptime. Less maintenance cost.
children.description: Ceramic  Both protects equipment and dampens noise. Explore Ceramic

content.value: ​Our ceramic wear plates and sheeting provide extremely long wear life, which means more uptime, lower maintenance cost and improved production.

​SANDVIK CERAMIC WEAR PROTECTION

Our WG9200 Ceramic Wear Protection Sheeting offers extremely long wear life in applications with sliding wear. The sheeting bends easily, making it ideal protection for both concave and convex surfaces.


Lightweight and incredibly durable

  • Reduce installation time
    The sheeting features CN bonding to simplify adhesion and reduce installation time.
  • Stays fixed
    Its high bond strength ensures sheeting is securely attached throughout its wear life.
  • Easy to handle
    The compact size and light weight makes the sheeting easy for one person to handle.
  • Suitable for many applications
    Ceramic sheeting can easily be adjusted to your application needs.


WT9200 Ceramic Wear Protection Plates

WT9200 Ceramic Wear Protection Plates are intended for tough applications with high flows of coarse material. Hard ceramic wear plates are vulcanized into durable rubber that functions as a noise and impact dampener.

  • Space no object
    The plates are ideal when weight and space are limiting factors.
  • Extended intervals between replacement
    Extremely long wear life saves on service and replacement.
  • Cut to size
    The plates are easily cut with no need for expensive diamond blades.
  • Cost-effective to install and maintain
    The low-friction, smooth surface keeps production going, minimizing downtime.

children.title: Rubber wear plates
children.subTitle: Versatile, long-lasting wear protection
children.description: Rubber Versatile wear protection that can be tailor-made to fit your needs. Explore Rubber

content.value: ​Sandvik long-lasting rubber wear plates come with full steel backing or extruded aluminum profiles. They provide versatile wear protection that can be tailor-made to fit your needs.

​Choose the rubber wear plate that suits you

Our rubber wear plates come in five different forms and strengths to suit the exact application you require.

content.text:
WG3500 Natural Red Rubber Sheeting


This high quality, long-lasting red rubber sheeting comes either smooth or with a bonding layer. It is a versatile, multi-purpose protective sheeting that can be tailor-made to fit most light to medium duty applications.

WG4000 Natural Black Rubber Sheeting

A wear-protection sheeting made for applications that need flexibility.  It works well in wet and dry applications with fine particles and sliding wear.

WG6000 Synthetic Rubber Sheeting

Thanks to its high tensile strength this sheeting is suitable for applications with sharp, crushed material. Available in smooth, tear-off or with bonding layer in 60 Shore A hardness.

WT6000 Corrugated Rubber Plates

These plates absorb the impact from the rock in applications with 10- to 50-degree impact angles. They extend equipment life by reducing excessive wear. They are lightweight compared to steel linings, and are easy to handle and safely install.

WT7000 Dual Hardness Rubber Plates

Constructed from dual hardness rubber these modular wear plates extend equipment life by reducing vibrations and dampening impact forces that can damage the support structure. Designed for light to medium duty, liners can easily be cut to size with a knife or band saw.

children.title: Impact bars
children.subTitle: Perfect protection for belts and conveyors
children.description: Impact bars Protection for belts and conveyors in the loading zone. Explore Impact bars

content.value: ​Protect your belts and conveyors in the loading zone with our impact bars that feature a top surface of low friction material and a core of durable, impact-absorbing rubber.

WT1000 Impact Bars

Featuring a top surface of low-friction material and a core of soft impact-absorbing rubber, WT1000 Impact Bars protect conveyor belts and conveyors. They are ideal for loading zones and transfer points. The impact bars have an extruded aluminum profile for quick and safe installation.

config:
Prevent damage
The soft rubber core of the impact bars absorbs impact energy, preventing costly damage to the structure. The low friction top surface does not impede production.

Prevents spillage
Supporting the belt edge improves tracking and reduces belt sagging. It prevents spillage of oil and grease.

Many uses
Its chemical resistant top surface makes it suitable for many applications.

children.title: Rebuilds and major components
children.subTitle: Double the service life for a fraction of the cost
children.description: Upgrade your equipment to the latest technology to improve your profitability.

content.value: ​Safe, reliable, rebuilt Sandvik machines have a proven, safe, productive and reliable lifetime in the toughest applications. When major components start to fail and equipment nears the end of its first life it can be restored to its original condition. ​

value.value: ​Reliability and endurance that’s as good as new Our comprehensive Sandvik rebuild and major component services can double the average service life for a fraction of new capital investment cost. All rebuilds come with a full 12-month component warranty which is extended if installed by a qualified Sandvik Service technician. You can expect up to 80% higher reliability from our component exchange program compared with non-OEM exchange alternatives​

content.value:
​

children.title: Equipment rebuilds
children.subTitle: When old becomes new again
children.description: Equipment Rebuilds Enjoyhigh performance, a longer life and significant savings from your equipment Explore equipment rebuilds

content.value: ​Your safe, productive and reliable Sandvik equipment has proven its worth. But even the best machines need to be rebuilt. Our equipment rebuilds and upgrades extend the lifetime of units, reducing unexpected downtime and enhancing machinery with latest safety features. And it’s more cost-efficient to rebuild a machine than buy a new one.

value.value:
O​riginal equipment rebuilds

Investing in scheduled machine rebuilds and overhauls give you peace of mind in using the knowledge and experience of an original equipment manufacturer. It also gives you compliance with latest quality, safety and reliability standards, and productivity improvements. It can even double the average service life or your machine.

content.value:
Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

 

 * Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Loaders
children.subTitle: Reliable, productive and safe rebuilds
children.description: Choose the scope of service from full rebuilds, partial rebuilds of selected subsystems or incorporate safety improvements and productivity upgrades for key loader components. Explore loaders

content.value: ​A Sandvik loader rebuild is an investment in productivity, reliability and safety. Your loader returns in “as new” condition, gaining as many as 12,000 additional production hours from your original investment.

value.value: ​Choose from three different scopes of standardized loader rebuild: full rebuilds, partial rebuilds and local adaptations. We also offer specific safety improvements and productivity upgrades for key loader components. The end result is a safer, more reliable and productive loader. All work is guaranteed by a 12-month/1,000-hour Sandvik warranty.

content.text: Restoring your loader to “as new” condition is a fraction of the cost of a new unit. It offers up to 20% increased reliability without new capital investment.
Rebuild important subsystems such as power train, front end, hydraulic and electrical systems to extend efficiency and productivity.
Customize equipment with upgrades to work at optimal performance for the conditions and comply with local regulation.

content.value:
Safety upgrades

Our safety upgrades include for example upgrades of fire suppression, LED lighting, side and reverse cameras, recovery systems and safety railings.

Productivity upgrades

Sandvik productivity upgrades include Sandvik GET (Ground Engaging Tools), axles exhaust systems, engine upgrades for greater fuel savings and reduced environmental footprint; hydraulic system upgrades and much more.

Improve productivity, reduce maintenance costs

Backed up by a 12-month/1,000-hour warranty, original Sandvik parts and systematic processes you can reduce maintenance costs by a factor of 20. Our expert engineers ensure rebuild quality and minimized turnaround time, increasing your productivity.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.




 * Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Mechanical cutting
children.subTitle: Extend lifetimes beyond 20 years
children.description:
Upgrade machines or key components of the cutting system using the latest technology for extended performance.
Explore mechanical cutting

content.value: ​Rebuilding mechanical cutting machines increase machine lifetime and can raise process efficiency by up to 80 percent when upgrading all key components with latest technology. Our machines can be rebuilt up to four times, giving them a lifetime of more than 20 years.

value.value:
​Boosting Equipment ROI

Upgrading all key components of your mechanical cutting machine during a Sandvik rebuild can double the performance and use of the machine. The average costs for upgrades to the latest technologies are 70-80% of the investment cost of a new machine. Upgrades include up-dating to the latest technology, making the machine even better than before the rebuild, In short, a  Sandvik upgrade offers you significant productivity gains and is a much more cost-efficient solution than that offered by competing companies.

content.text: Only we have the experience, know-how and parts to upgrade all key cutting system components to the latest technology. These include rock cutting tools, cutter head, cutter gearbox, cutter e-motor and more.
Machines are improved to incorporate all of the latest safety features.
Upgrading machines to the most current design offers substantial productivity improvements.
These functional upgrades enable wider equipment utilization.

content.value:
Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

children.title: Major components
children.subTitle: Major protection for your valuable equipment
children.description: Our component exchange, new-for-old and repair-and-return programs offer superior uptime. Explore major components

content.value: ​Protect your business from unexpected stoppages with our major component programs.

Lower cost of ownership, maximize productivity

We engineer Sandvik equipment for safety, productivity and reliability in the toughest mining conditions. Our essential parts and components, quick logistical processes and trained service technicians, help you protect your investment and keep it productive 365 days a year. Ahead of planned maintenance or during component failure, select from one of our major component solutions and benefit from cost advantages without having to compromise on quality or warranty. Each solution comes with its own unique advantages but what they all have in common is their focus on lowering your total cost of ownership whilst maximizing your productivity.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

children.title: New-for-old program
children.subTitle: Save while you enjoy peace of mind
children.description: Avoid the cost of disposing of old parts, and save money on new, fully-warrantied parts. Explore New-for-old

content.value: ​Our cost-efficient new-for-old program offers you a new part at a reduced price, when you return your old used parts. You'll benefit from reduced downtime while maximizing your operating economy. The program is available for selected parts families such as cylinders and offered under a special agreement.

value.value: ​New-for-old cylinder kits assure maximum uptime and operational performance at a reduced price. Replacement of cylinders with this program helps ensure safety of your personnel and equipment by avoiding breakdowns often caused by ad-hoc repair or inferior replacements. This proactive replacement program can reduce your costs by 2 to 3 times over the course of several years.

config:
Longer life
Sandvik genuine cylinders last longer, reducing costs and downtime.

Quality tested
Our cylinders are manufactured and tested to quality standards and tolerances.

Fully warrantied
All cylinders include a six-month warranty from the date of purchase.

content.value:
​Improve site safety

Some motors consist of up to 20 cylinders and the reliability of the machine is at risk if one be-comes weak. By exchanging old cylinders for new, you can protect your equipment and machinery from leaking cylinders or frustrating unplanned movement during operation, benefiting both your equipment and the people who work with it.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.

 

 

* Test results are to be considered as results reached under certain and controlled test conditions. These test results should not be treated as specifications and Sandvik does not guarantee, warrant or represent the outcome of test results in any or all circumstances.

children.title: Repair and return program
children.subTitle: Reliable performance and cost savings
children.description: Minimize downtime and save up to 25% compared to purchasing new products. Explore Repair-and-return

content.value: ​Maintain continuous productivity while saving on the cost of purchasing new components.

value.value: ​Your components are inspected and repaired by our expertly trained specialists in state of the art workshops, who can even upgrade certain components to the latest specification and tech-nologies.  On return, the condition of your repaired component is close to that of a new component, ensuring maximum reliability, endurance and safety, and with the same warranty as a new component.

config:
Cost effective
Enjoy cost savings compared to the purchase of new parts.

Convenient
Each kit contains all the parts that should be replaced during each standard service.

Reliable
Enhance component reliability and availability of your equipment. Repaired components have  more than 85% reliability and endurance compared to new components.

content.value:
Warranty

Receive the same warranty as a new component with our standard Component repair and Return solution.

 

Availability of these services is dependent on our local organizations capabilities.
